# pvjs

This is an npm module design to perform common uses in the pVelocity JSAPI2 framework.

## Getting Started

Install the ``pvjs`` module.

    npm install --save pvjs

Use the require statement to load the module into the global namespace.

```js
require('pvjs');
```
